title: 31-year-old man gunned down in Panadura
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 31-year-old man was gunned down in Panadura on Friday (3) afternoon.
Sri Lanka Police said the shooter had arrived in a motorcycle and an investigation is underway.
